mapper.select: select c.device as device, d.id as testId, c.api_path as apiPath, d.api_case_mark as apiCaseMark, d.result_status as resultStatus, d.report_id as reportId, d.aid as id from uri c, (select a.report_id as report_id, b.api_id as api_id, b.id as id, a.result_status as result_status, b.api_case_mark as api_case_mark, a.id as aid from api_report a, apicase b where a.test_id = b.id) d where c.id = d.api_id and d.report_id = #{reportId}
select count(*) from api_report where result_status = 1 and report_id = #{reportId};
